data.title: Iberia Parish Government
data.meta_description: Under limited supervision, acts as a liaison between the President and Parish staff. Work involves serving as the Presidentâ€™s administrator, manager of governmental functions, and executive supervisor of positions involved in Parish governance. Reports to the Parish President.
data.text:
The Executive Assistant to Parish President proudly serves as their trusted representative, acting on directives and assuming various capacities. The primary focus is to streamline communication channels, serving as the crucial link between the Parish President and all others ensuring the smooth functioning of Parish government.

Beyond serving as a bridge for communication, they engage in proactive problem-solving and conflict resolution, while working with all parties to address concerns and collaborate towards common goals. Additionally, by providing vital coordination, they manage projects and activities by serving as liaison with dignitaries, Parish departments, consultants, contractors, external agencies and other key partners.

The Executive Assistant embraces multifaceted responsibilities to contribute to the success of Iberia Parish Government.
